name: Dots eXtreme Free
description:
Dots eXtreme is a classic dots puzzle with new level of difficulty. Connect matching colors, use bridges and tubes to complete more than 300 handmade puzzles. There are different board sizes available, ranging from 10x10 to 20x20 cells.

Game is ideal for Tablets and large Smartphones, but you can play even largest puzzles on smaller devices using zoom and pan gestures.
